website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive camouflage cover for small areas.
pros: No shine to give a realistic look
Also works well to provide shade
Made of waterproof fabric that is designed to dry quickly
cons: Does not include stands, so it must be tied to available trees or hung over an area

customer_reviews.title: Dirt cheap fix for swingset fort
customer_reviews.text: I researched different options to fix the canopy on a kids swingset. This was by far the cheapest option and has already held up to some serious wind and rain. I'm not leaving it up during the winter because it probably won't hold up to feet of snow. Good cheap fix probably won't last a few seasons but it's cheap enough to replace. I think I spent around 15 bucks for it.
customer_reviews.author: Molz

customer_reviews.title: Great Out In The Field
customer_reviews.text: I love this camouflage netting. I'm a professional photographer and spend a lot of time out in the scrub and marsh in Florida and this netting allows me to set up a quick, lightweight blind super fast. It's also perfect to drape over my Jeep Wrangler whenever I need it to blend in better to my location. It does have some "noise" when the wind blows, but it sounds just like the rustling of leaves and palm fronds so it actually helps me blend in even more. I most definitely recommend this product for hunting, camping, photography and anything else outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: tjwaller

customer_reviews.title: Looked good, worked great!
customer_reviews.text: For my fellow old-timer veterans... this is not our camo-netting. I was expecting something more cloth-like as I remembered from my military service. This was more plastic than cloth. It seems that the "new" material would hold up longer and better under field conditions. We didn't use it in the field. It was used as part of a set for a military-themed play. It looked excellent under theatrical lighting, held up well, and covered the area needed easily. It was also not impossible to fold up when it was done. The photo doesn't do it justice... very pleased with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Irma took all of my huge shade trees and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hurricane Irma took all of my huge shade trees and privacy, and my friend came up with this idea to structure this netting above and on my fence. It is decent quality and will def get your needs met and if you double it in half, no one will see you. Buy and Try... I am getting more as we speak👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE......
customer_reviews.text: THROW IT IN A STUFF BAG AND GO! DEPLOYS QUICKLY FOR A HIDE, GOOD FOR OVER HEAD COVER. NOT MILITARY GRADE, BUT NOT A MILITARY $$$$$$ EITHER! I'D BUY IT AGAIN. ** UPDATE: PURCHASED TWO DIFFERENT BRANDS IN 2017, WITHIN A $ OR SO APART. BOTH HUNG SAME TIME FOR PRIVACY THIS ONE. (***** FADED, FAILED BADLY*******) 👎 NO GOOD FOR LONG TERM OUTSIDE, OTHER LOOKS NEW! NOT RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: FARMER JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I need a net up in my back yard to hide my neighbors eye sore of a shed. Real military nets are so expensive. Picked this up. Well you get what you pay for. Hopefully it will last a year. Itd be fine for a temporary blind or to cover an atv but long term exposure to the sun and elements will trash this in a few months
customer_reviews.author: RonJ

customer_reviews.title: Not like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged very well but the pictures are somewhat misleading. From farther away it camouflages much better. I put this around my kiddos bunk bed and you can see right through it. I was hoping it would work much better. I've used this type of netting before and usually, you can see one way. This is not the case. Wasn't what I was hoping for but my child likes it. I think...
customer_reviews.author: Randall BryanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: After careful comparative shopping, I've found this item to be the best value for the money. The quality is good and they are versatile, since multiple units can be tied together to form a larger one into the desired shape one wants. I'm ordering three more.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred Knight

customer_reviews.title: Handy shade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 to slightly overlap as I tried to provide a little shade for my dog. She enjoys the shade. The string net is one layer and the camo is another layer, so there is definitely a "down" side and an "up" side. The side tie strings were excellent for securing the shade cover to the sides of the kennel.
customer_reviews.author: n0name12

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my 4 wheeler with when I deer hunt but ended up giving it to a friend who used it to wrap a tripod stand with. He ran it from the roof rail and let it hang long. It only covered three sides but it worked like a charm. He had deer within 15 feet of him with no problem. I'll probably buy another one for me to use next season.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Briery

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was looking for something like this for a while, and finally found it. The quality seem to be very good, has the back netting as well. I used it on the back yard fence, behind the freshly planted plants, so any voids that there are in between the bushes, the camo takes care of it, and blends in at the same time. Perfect size too, and for the price... can't beat that! Only thing I've noticed, after purchasing 10+ of them, some ended up being slightly lighter in color than the others, but having it used for the purpose I'm using it for, it's not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Made in USA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were camouflage netting is an excellent product! I am so happy with my purchase. They are large, light weight without being cheap. The material and netting is strong and very easy to unroll. I'm very glad I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to camouflage some items stored near a wall adjacent to the neighbor (trying to be a good neighbor) and also to drape over a woodshed to break it up in the garden. Hope it last long.
customer_reviews.author: Sarkis Jacob Babachanian

customer_reviews.title: These worked like a charm to give me some privacuy from my ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked like a charm to give me some privacuy from my NOSEY NEIGHBOR! Do I care if they like CAMI? NOPE! But I do, and they blend with the tree and tellis.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Serves many purposes🙂
customer_reviews.text: Definitely served it's purpose of an under bed fort😆. My son can easily see through it from the inside, but very hard to see through it from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lochstein

customer_reviews.title: I really hate how the square netting on the back side hangs ...
customer_reviews.text: I really hate how the square netting on the back side hangs free and gets caught on everything. Otherwise the material is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: For the price...shockingly great
customer_reviews.text: We are military and using this for outdoor space when we have get together's is perfect. I wouldn't use this to be outside constantly as it would fall apart after one summer I suspect. But for when we have get together's and want to have a certain area a bit more shaded....this works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: we used this for our camo hunting party photo wall. it was easy to use just open and ready, we used staplers to hang it on the stick. the signs are also from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good bang 4ur buck
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with .. covers and blends well .. No it was not given to me ... i bought it... satisfied would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: ARROWFLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We are redoing all of our kids' rooms this year for their birthday and my son wanted a military theme. This was perfect and it is a good size. The netting behind is perfect cuz it allows to hang up until that part of it hangs so it looks more realistic. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Just pure junk
customer_reviews.text: Due to price I wasn't expecting a lot, but expected better than this. I draped this over a well framed roof over my grill & smoker area, a couple of feet away from them. Never even used them while this was up. It lasted a year, now it's in shards. Even the string rotted. May be good for indoor decoration but definitely NOT for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Butler Designs

customer_reviews.title: as I've seen better, but this absolutely got the job done
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't necessarily a fan of the material, as I've seen better, but this absolutely got the job done. Would buy a second in the future
customer_reviews.author: S X F

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy for a home patio
customer_reviews.text: I use it to filter the direct sunlight on my deck. It lets partial light through and air can still flow through for a comfortable place to stay. You also can see through it. When not in use ,I fold it and put it in a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but it is not good on a stand. Holes are to big and game can see threw it. Has strings that will hang up on everything when getting in and out of the stand. But it last a lot longer than burlap.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Decent camouflage
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well to drape over a treehouse I am hiding in my front yard. Used with ivy fence panels, this covered the smaller spots. Snags on things easily, but that is probably by design. Seems to hold up well. Wish these were 8ft.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: Better the  expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted for my sons room. We hung up peg board with hooks to hang his nerf guns then put up the mesh. This product was bigger then expected and looks great. Extremely happy with this buy. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as the old stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as the military stuff from years past but it's adequete for putting around deer stands. It has the twine backing which is nice. Fabric is a little shiny but I'm hoping it'll fade with exposure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steger

customer_reviews.title: Superb durability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for my sons Nerf Wars party last May and after the party my son hung them up around his treehouse. They are in heavy wind and weather and are still holding up nicely! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for tents, not so much much for birding
customer_reviews.text: The cloth does not have big enough cuts for 92mm diameter lense to peep out. You can make those on your own. The threads on one side of the cloth are annoying. It may work on tents etc but not as much to camouflage yourself at location. I will need to search for another camouflage.
customer_reviews.author: True Report

customer_reviews.title: War party necessity!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accessory for my son's army/nerf party. It's very large and durable. My son keeps it in his room with all his camo stuff. Very sturdy netting. Easy to use as decoration or hunting too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Summers

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not milspec quality by any means - but okay for the price. The green is brighter than expected and the material a bit thin, but it works as a deer blind and has held up in some high winds. Have not noticed any excess noise.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Air it out
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Was the perfect size. Totally smelled like new pool toys when we first opened it. Just had to air it out and spray it down with a scent killer
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the desert
customer_reviews.text: Living in the desert requires lots of artificial shade without being gaudy colors. These were just perfect so bought 10 of them. They do the job and blend in to the landscape but you can still see thru. Have lots of wind and have held up well although a couple are torn but were easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. It is noisy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. It is noisy, but not a big deal. Had it set up for shade and it held up well in high winds. Material doesn't tear as easily as other similar items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shooting advantage.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this netting as a blind in front of my shooting bench. It seems to be effectively hiding me from Squirrels that like my Walnut trees.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Subpar for minimal use. If you’re looking to just have some decorations that camouflage AWAY for an event and don’t care than this is for you the key word here is AWAY that is where this product will go CAMOUFLAGED AWAY into a garbage abyss that is termed INSTANT GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: Christopher jones

customer_reviews.title: Durra
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiding my chicken coop, I bought some other brands that were only camo o. One side, this has it on both, more durable with netting, which doubles as bird netting to keep the pests out
customer_reviews.author: Scott Woods

customer_reviews.title: Best Net Ive found so far.
customer_reviews.text: Im very pleased. Very hight quality. In the applications I have beennusing it for it has not torn or come apart. I it was a good size for two fourwheelers in a convoy configuration. I love it very muchnso far!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Merica

customer_reviews.title: CAMO COVER
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR MY HUSBAND TO COVER HIS QUAD WHILE HUNTING IN THE WOODS....HE SAID IT WORKS VERY WELL. COVER BLENDS IN WITH THE WOODS.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: But it! Color, price and durability was great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, size and durability. We put it under ours sons loft bed and it’s so cool. The colors are great and the size was perfect. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Borchowiec

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. It does exactly what I need it to do, provide shade while camping. The only downside is the 550 cord that you use to tie it off is much stronger that the netting itself and causes one the netting to rip if you’re not careful. Outside of that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The Color is good. the size is good, the camo is fair, the under net is horrible bad quality and thin, this is like a toy netting. This thing wont last. Will update!
customer_reviews.author: SergioArb

customer_reviews.title: Just setup, seams nice
customer_reviews.text: I literally just setup so this isn't a long term review. I think you get your money's worth for what it is. You can see through it if no double layering it FYI
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Used as canopy. Durable, breathable, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used as a canopy and it worked awesome! Stood strong in high winds & downpours. Added extra shade with lots of fresh air. Not hot or stifling - air was able to move.
customer_reviews.author: Mima1213

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my ground blind. Worked well and has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sprayberry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Party would not have been the same without this. I was very impressed. Looks great! Easy to hang. Used it for a 3yr old bday party.
customer_reviews.author: julie l.

customer_reviews.title: Ginsco 6.5 x 10'
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - I am using them to shade parts of my backyard in preparation of 117* again and so far they are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Perizzolo

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backdrop was absolutely gorgeous. Very lightweight and durable. Great price also!
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Very loud material
customer_reviews.text: Made out of a loud plastic material. Very loud when anything (including wind) moves it.
customer_reviews.author: rphtwins

customer_reviews.title: Not for duck hunters!
customer_reviews.text: Not good for duck hunters as there is a lot of shine to the material. Other then that it is well built. Heavy cord to tie off at corners and points inbetween.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: shady practice of price increase while in shopping cart.
customer_reviews.text: recommended this to a friend & relatives. when they added in shopping cart, the price increase 30 minutes later. shady indeed! will never shop amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Color was unexpected
customer_reviews.text: The actual product was a fairly dark green that appeared more gray and brown on the website. Still hope to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore N. Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Great priduct for the $
customer_reviews.text: The size and the design of this product are perfect for the purpose of covering an above ground 250-gallon propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: kathy b

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: It helps keep our property private, very durable and well made. Great price also
customer_reviews.author: G. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived packed very compactly
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how small a package this is packed into. Appreciate that. It's vacuum-sealed in clear plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cascadian

customer_reviews.title: Keep it in the vacuum packed bag it came in until I need it
customer_reviews.text: I’ll Keep it in the vacuum packed bag it came in until I need itThe sealed container it comes in makes it very mobile and easy to store in my bug out bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to go cheap route and not put this to heavy use this is ok. Rips easy and netting is thin and in disarray. If your going to need something durable for long use hunting, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: COW PUPPY

customer_reviews.title: Camping privacy
customer_reviews.text: Great privacy when camping ! I use it around my sun screen and works great
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: Great item for cage concealment would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to conceal feral cat cag. It works great would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for photo blind.
customer_reviews.text: I used 4 panels to cover an old deck canopy frame. Two reasons, to provide shade and to use as photo blind for taking photos of bird's. It works great for both. An added bonus it's the grandkids love their new "hideout".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shade for my chickens
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to add shade in the chicken pen, it’s breathable and not an eyesore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime User

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t very happy with the quality. This item is more of a light duty netting. I usually use the heavy duty army netting which is what I thought I was buying. I’m using it for my ground bling anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Baca

customer_reviews.title: $12 is a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: big, light and as tough as I would expect for $12. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: speaker4hire

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but you get what you pay for quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It was light and inexpensive. It served its purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: It was light and inexpensive. It served its purpose and that was to cover my small tent when camping. It was made of a shiny plastic but seemed to be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Party Decor
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to! Went perfectly with a Fortnite Birthday party as a table cover. It blended in so well with everything, you wouldn’t even know it was there. But you do, because the review is about it sooo
customer_reviews.author: CarrieDe

customer_reviews.title: Good price works indoors.
customer_reviews.text: This package is good for covering a motorcycle sized object, indoors, for a reasonable price. In the sunlight outdoors, it looks thin. I use it for the former so I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: bmw325alex

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cut and and drape over boxes and rods. Added a great touch to my sons military theme birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough tough ready
customer_reviews.text: Works to do its job in all weather, great company with service
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Great camo, even greater price.
customer_reviews.text: Good camo, use it duck hunting for special blind style.
customer_reviews.author: michelle miller

customer_reviews.title: Best cubicle accessory, great at blocking light, keeps people away
customer_reviews.text: Sits over top of my cubicle at work. Blocks out a lot of the overhead fluorescent lighting that just zaps my energy throughout the day. Also works great at stopping people from bothering me
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: gets all caught up to gear
customer_reviews.text: All the netting gets caught up when getting in and out of tree stand
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Light Weight!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trunk-or-treat idea, so didn't use it for the standard reasons. Nonetheless, the product is nice and light weight and arrived on time. Can't ask for too much more :)
customer_reviews.author: Loves Listening

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover!
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy on the fly and was easy to setup! Highly recommend for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Netting
customer_reviews.text: This was used to cover a chicken run. It provided the birds with shade from the summer sun and blocked the hawks from watching them. It had some fading and the squirrels tore the material off the netting after a while. This is our second purchased this product and we will use it for the same purpose this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mc

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little small and very thin but work well enough
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to shade garden. It worked great and is good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but it feels cheap and is noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for windy applications
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Nothing special. The actual netting isn't attached to the camo strips in many places. It does the job. Wouldn't recommend for windy applications.
customer_reviews.author: BearMersch

customer_reviews.title: Adds some privacy. Served its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang up, Light weight, not totally private but helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this for vbs decorating. Great quality! Will be able to use repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my popup shade as a decoration for our grandson's birthday party. He and his friends had their own camo hq for their nerf war
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D Bishop

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these over the last three years and each time they get worse. Very cheap quality. The dimensions never match. Last time for me now have become a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: gerlinde ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This was used as a backdrop for an army themed birthday party! It was perfect! Easy to use and hang.
customer_reviews.author: BLOWIN’ UP EVENTS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some netting to cover some items in our hallway and it worked great. I got a large enough one to double for extra coverage.
customer_reviews.author: J A W

customer_reviews.title: Made in the shade 😀
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup with my pop-up canopy. Just attach it to the side with some zip ties and you have a nice cool and shady area. I ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: Lorin Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good for camouflage cover.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby has made a "military hut" out of our patio! The "net" has held up well, has not lost its color and provides privacy from the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: DiverGal

customer_reviews.title: I will order again
customer_reviews.text: Used two to block the Sun in the afternoon on my promenade, they blend in with all the surrounding plants.
customer_reviews.author: mass begood

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks very realistic. Fairly good quality for the price and would definitely buy this item again. I used this to build a deer blind and had tracks coming right past it.
customer_reviews.author: Soma-nambulism

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We had this for a month and it’s already coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Olaguivel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome material! Used for a army themed birthday party but now I’m using it as my sons bedroom curtain and he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Cover up
customer_reviews.text: Works great for covering our trash cans which have to stay by our front door. Condeminum living
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Brede

customer_reviews.title: Great product for affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The camo cover reduced the heat in the greenhouse dramatically
customer_reviews.author: Betty Fekete

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality... not cheap, not plastic! Worked perfect for a birthday backdrop. I could have had it bigger but decided to extend it to about 4ft... would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: He can play army real good now with this
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest hit with my 8 yr. old grandson. He can play army real good now with this.
customer_reviews.author: gr

customer_reviews.title: Well made too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camo cloth! Love the sizes you can get in this fine cloth! Well made also!
customer_reviews.author: Debby P

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: thought it would be good for my pergola, however way too light!! no where near real military grade!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for an 11 year old’s bed fort. It acts as a curtain doorway & it’s perfect! I am pleased with how well it works. I used some beach towel clips to secure it to the bed & he loves it! It was a great buy, especially for the price. Very very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tangled web of string...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to cover a 4-wheeler when hunting. I opened the package to find a tangled mess of woven string and plastic leaves. I attempted to cover my 4-wheeler only to get the string hung up on everything. It was a complete disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Looked super cool and kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: I used these for decorating an army-themed room. Looked super cool and kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: cakewalk

product_meta.title: Ginsco 6.5ft x 10ft 2mx3m 6.5ft x 20ft 2mx6m Woodland Camouflage Netting Desert Camo Net for Camping Military Hunting Shooting Blind Watching Hide Party Decorations
product_meta.description:
Description:
Lightweight, quick drying
Water, rot and mould resistant
Treated to eliminate shine or glare
Ideal for hunting and shooting, building shelters etc
NOTE: Cut size is usually slightly bigger than the given size

Package includes:
1 x Camouflage Net
PLEASE NOTE: Cut size is usually slightly bigger than the given size
feature_bullets: Material: Polyester Oxford Fabric. Lightweight, quick drying .Waterproof, rot and mould resistant. Treated for eliminate shine or glare.
